units.name: Lifeline
units.prompt: Stay adjacent to the most threatened ally. Use patch on the most wounded teammate. If all healthy, use overclock on your damage dealer.

units.name: Ghost
units.prompt: Cloak and move behind enemy lines. Target isolated enemies with shadow_strike. Save breach for the most dangerous enemy. Avoid being caught uncloaked.

units.name: Lens
units.prompt: Use scan to reveal enemy prompts and cloaked units. Stay at max range (â‰¤4 tiles for scan). Use recalibrate on wounded allies to buff them. Keep distance from enemies and avoid adjacent vectors.

player.placementPrompt: Place aggressive units forward on one flank. Support units behind and toward center.

units.name: Weaver
units.prompt: Place traps on tiles enemies are likely to move through. Use pulse if 2+ enemies are adjacent. Stay near allies for mutual support.

units.name: Rampart
units.prompt: Push forward aggressively. Shield_wall facing the enemy cluster. If flanked, turn to face the biggest threat. Attack when possible.

units.name: Shade
units.prompt: Cloak immediately on turn 1. Move toward the enemy medic or weakest target. Use shadow_strike when adjacent while cloaked. Use breach to sabotage high-value targets.

opponent.placementPrompt: Place the tankiest unit center front. Ranged units in the back. Flankers on the edges.
